summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates the behavior of an AWS Service Discovery (Cloud Map) client library. It covers mock server listing, namespace lifecycle (HTTP, private DNS, public DNS), service CRUD operations, instance registration and discovery with filters and pagination, operation helper mappings, and tag management, all using the Moto library to simulate AWS services.
business_intent: To ensure the reliability and correctness of the Service Discovery client implementation by automatically testing all core functionalities—namespace handling, service management, instance operations, and tagging—before deployment in production environments.
